result.reason: Clipboard content filtering is handled entirely by the Microsoft RDP ActiveX control (MSTSCLib), not mRemoteNG — this is a known MSTSC bug with non-EN-US keyboard layouts
result.approach: Cannot fix — mRemoteNG only sets RedirectClipboard=true on the MSTSC ActiveX control and performs no clipboard content processing. The number-stripping on non-EN-US layouts is a Microsoft RDP client component issue. Users should report to Microsoft or try workarounds like setting the remote session keyboard layout to match local.

attempts.raw_output:
Based on my analysis, this is a known issue with the Microsoft RDP ActiveX control (MSTSCLib), not mRemoteNG code. mRemoteNG simply sets `RedirectClipboard` on the MSTSC control at `RdpProtocol.cs:1168` and does no clipboard content filtering. The number-stripping behavior with non-EN-US keyboard layouts is a Microsoft RDP client bug.
